participant_1.background:
I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents.
I wake up early and drink a glass of water to hydrate my body.
i am an middle school teacher for 8th grade.
i love to read harry potter books.

participant_2.background:
I spend my free time fixing up junk cars and making YouTube videos about it.
I enjoy reading my favorite book, Anne of Green Gables, on the weekend.
i take medication.
I am not close to my family and do not know what they do for a living.
I'm not very close to my family, but I'm working on it.

content.text: I like to fix up junk cars and make YouTube videos about it.
That sounds like a fun hobby! Do you enjoy working on cars?
Yeah, I find it very relaxing. What do you enjoy doing in your free time?
I like to read books, especially Harry Potter. I'm also a middle school teacher for 8th grade.
That's awesome! I love Harry Potter too. I'm not very close to my family, but I'm working on it.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm close to my family, but I know that's not the case for everyone.
Yeah, it's a work in progress. What do you like about reading Harry Potter?
I love the characters and the story. It's so magical and heartwarming.
Me too! I love how it's a coming of age story, and how Harry learns to deal with the challenges he faces.
Yeah, it's a great story. What's your favorite book in the series?
I think my favorite book is the Prisoner of Azkaban. What's yours?
I think mine is the Order of the Phoenix. I love the way it explores the dark side of the wizarding world.
Me too! That's a great book. I'm glad we both enjoy Harry Potter.
Me too! It's a great series.
